Virtual Instrument Software Architecture (VISA)¶

Dependencies¶

Requires the PyVISA module installed on the system

Interface¶

class labtronyx.interfaces.i_VISA.i_VISA(manager)[source]¶

VISA Controller

Wraps PyVISA. Requires a VISA driver to be installed on the system.

addResource(ResID, VID, PID)¶

Manually add a resource to the controller

Parameters:
  • ResID (str) – Resource Identifier
  • VID (str) – Vendor Identifier
  • PID (str) – Product Identifier
Returns:

bool - True if successful, False otherwise
close()[source]¶

Stops the VISA Controller. Stops the controller thread and frees all resources associated with the controller.

destroyResource(ResID)¶

Remove a manually added resource

Parameters:ResID (str) – Resource Identifier
Returns:bool - True if successful, False otherwise
open()[source]¶

Initialize the VISA Controller. Instantiates a VISA Resource Manager and starts the controller thread.

Return True if success, False if an error occurred

run()¶

Interface thread
